data.name: My Demon Wife
data.detailed_description:
90s, outbreak of mass psychosis occurs on the B-movie set. Actors, fully dressed up in costumes start to murder each other. The wave of evil was so big, it has summoned the demon which possesed the main star of the movie – Rinona Wider. Beautiful woman became evil, powerful and immortal. She captured you, and made you her husband and slave. The movie set becomes the real hell on earth. You land in a creepy castle with mummies and other monsters running around (and nobody knows where they are coming from). Your wife orders you to clean all of this mess and you do it – because insubordination is punished with a painful death. But when she goes to sleep, it’s time for you to explore new locations and hunt for monsters in the garden.. There must be freedom hiding somewhere!


Prepare yourself for the funny scary ride spiced with 90s nostalgia. We were inspired by:
Games: Blood, Quake, Duke Nukem
Movies: Braindead, From Dusk Till Dawn, They Live
Music: AC/DC, Guns and Roses, Metallica.

MDW is a low budget production made by a small team of gamedev veterans.
If you’re searching for something new, unique and made with passion – you’re in a right place!

Key Features:

  • The atmosphere of 90s games
  • Horror+comedy+simulator!
  • FPS elements
  • 5 hours of gameplay minimum
  • Rinona Wider!
data.about_the_game:
90s, outbreak of mass psychosis occurs on the B-movie set. Actors, fully dressed up in costumes start to murder each other. The wave of evil was so big, it has summoned the demon which possesed the main star of the movie – Rinona Wider. Beautiful woman became evil, powerful and immortal. She captured you, and made you her husband and slave. The movie set becomes the real hell on earth. You land in a creepy castle with mummies and other monsters running around (and nobody knows where they are coming from). Your wife orders you to clean all of this mess and you do it – because insubordination is punished with a painful death. But when she goes to sleep, it’s time for you to explore new locations and hunt for monsters in the garden.. There must be freedom hiding somewhere!

data.short_description: Horror game with comedy and simulator elements. You are a badass with a gun, but somehow you’ve been captured by immortal demon woman. She made you her husband and a slave. Will you be able to survive and break free?
data.supported_languages: English, French, Italian, German, Spanish - Spain, Simplified Chinese, Polish, Russian

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: Core I3
  • Memory: 6 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Radeon RX 6400, Nvidia GeForce GTX 770
  • DirectX: Version 10
  • Storage: 3 GB available space
  • Additional Notes: It runs smoothly on most PC that are not older than 2012
pc_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
  • OS: Windows 10
  • Processor: i7
  • Memory: 16 GB RAM
  • Graphics: NVIDIA GeForce GTX 1060
  • DirectX: Version 11
  • Storage: 3 GB available space

mac_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system
mac_requirements.recommended:
Recommended:
  • Requires a 64-bit processor and operating system

content_descriptors.notes:
Dismembered body parts of monsters. 
Blood, guts, and gore.
Nothing special and the game is not super realistic but there will be a lot of B Class horror elements.
